translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Domingos José de Almeida. Pelotas, June 2, 1843.

With much satisfaction I received a letter from Your Excellency with ten patacões, which I remit by the bearer hereof, who is Mr. Teixeira, and since you have opened this path for me, I must beg the favor if, out of respect for Your Excellency, Your Excellency

From Your Excellency João Antônio de Oliveira Aguiar.

Answered on June 29, 1843.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Piratini.
